name: The Other Me
description:
What if you could break from your mortal body? Unbound and unchained?

This project was built for the GMTK jam of 2021 as a part of Team Pangolins in Pyjamas.

Members:

Jazzals: Art & animation

ProphecyToad: Level Designer & programmer

Me (Nero119/Grimthier): Programming & animation

Resource recognition

A huge shout out to the following people for their free assets

Maaoat's Mossy Cavern tile set

Fallbeard for his fantastic music
